home.heroSubtitle: Docky connects talented hospitality professionals with businesses for on-demand shifts. Find work that fits your schedule, or hire the staff you need, right when you need them.
home.forJobSeekersSubtitle: Take control of your work life.
home.forBusinessesSubtitle: Fill shifts in minutes, not days.
home.businessBenefit1: Access a pool of vetted professionals.
home.businessBenefit3: Manage everything in one simple dashboard.
home.featuredShiftsSubtitle: Get a glimpse of the latest opportunities available right now.
home.appDownloadTitle: Get the full experience on our app
home.appDownloadSubtitle: Manage your shifts, get instant notifications, and connect on the go. Download the Docky app today for the best experience.

shiftCard.chatComingSoon: Chat with business feature coming soon!

workerView.title: Find Your Next Shift
workerView.subtitle: Browse available shifts using the keyword tabs below. Your next opportunity is just a click away.
workerView.noShiftsMessage: There are no open shifts matching your criteria. Please check back later!

businessView.dashboardSubtitle: Manage your posted shifts and review applicants.
businessView.noShiftsMessage: Click the button below to post your first shift and find the talent you need.

login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.
login.loginAsBusiness: Log In as Business (The Local Cafe)

registration.title: Join the Docky Community
registration.subtitle: First, let us know what you're here for. Are you looking for flexible work or are you here to hire talented professionals?
registration.jobSeekerSubtitle: Find and apply for flexible shifts in restaurants, cafés, and events that fit your schedule.
registration.businessSubtitle: Post shifts in seconds and connect with a community of reliable, on-demand professionals.

jobSeekerRegistration.title: Create Your Worker Profile
jobSeekerRegistration.subtitle: Fill in your details to start finding shifts. Completing your profile to 80% or more helps you get verified faster.
jobSeekerRegistration.terms: I agree to the <1>Terms & Conditions</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.
jobSeekerRegistration.error_terms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
jobSeekerRegistration.error_job: Please select at least one preferred job category.
jobSeekerRegistration.error_location: Please select at least one preferred work location.

jobAnnouncerRegistration.title: Create Your Business Profile
jobAnnouncerRegistration.subtitle: Set up your business account to start posting shifts.
jobAnnouncerRegistration.displayAnonymousHelp: Hide business name on job posts (e.g., “Restaurant in Arroios, Lisbon”).

postShiftModal.title: Post a New Shift
postShiftModal.subtitle: Fill out the details below to find the right person for the job.
postShiftModal.description_placeholder: Briefly describe the shift, responsibilities, or requirements.

applicantsModal.title: Applicants for {{role}} Shift
applicantsModal.subtitle: Review the candidates below and select the best fit.

applicationModal.title: Confirm Your Application
applicationModal.subtitle: Review your profile match before submitting.
applicationModal.greatFitMessage: Your profile matches all the key requirements for this shift.
applicationModal.messagePlaceholder: Write a brief message to introduce yourself...

insights.title: Market Insights
insights.subtitle: Discover trends in the on-demand shift market to make smarter decisions.
insights.completionRateMessage: of filled shifts were successfully completed.

jobSeekerDashboard.subtitle: Here's a summary of your activity. Let's find your next shift.
jobSeekerDashboard.noAppliedMessage: You haven't applied for any shifts yet. Start exploring opportunities now!
jobSeekerDashboard.acceptanceMessage: You've been accepted for the {{role}} shift at {{business}}.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.subtitle: Oversee and manage all platform activity from one central hub.
adminDashboard.searchShiftsPlaceholder: Search by business, role, or date...
adminDashboard.noShiftsFoundMessage: There are no shifts that match your current search and filters.
adminDashboard.noJobSeekersFoundMessage: There are no job seekers that match your current search and filters.
adminDashboard.noBusinessesFoundMessage: There are no businesses that match your current search.
adminDashboard.emailOnProfileUpdateHelp: Send an email to users when their profile is updated by an admin.
adminDashboard.emailOnAppStatusChangeHelp: Send an email when a job seeker is accepted or rejected for a shift.
